name: Nezznar
appearance: Short, sallow skin, shaved scalp, black tattoo on forehead (necromantic symbol). Black leather armor and robes. Carries glass staff with carved spider at top.

goals: Find the Forge of Spells in Wave Echo Cave
Claim its secrets and power for himself
Eliminate anyone who knows about Wave Echo Cave
personality.mannerisms: Addresses enemies as 'guests'. Uses polite euphemisms for violence ('unfortunate events', 'that unpleasant business'). Thuggish beneath veneer.
personality.tactics: Information gathering. Manipulation. Using proxies (Cragmaws, Redbrands). Direct action only when necessary.

background: Drow who learned of Wave Echo Cave and Forge of Spells through unknown means. Established network of goblin and human agents to find it. Patient, methodical approach.

operations.cragmaw_tribe: Hired King Grol and Cragmaw goblins to watch for Rockseekers, capture Gundren, steal map
operations.redbrands: Hired Iarno 'Glasstaff' Albrek to control Phandalin, intimidate settlers, keep area quiet
operations.bugbears: Sent 3 bugbears each to Cragmaw Castle and Redbrand hideout as enforcers
operations.current_location: Wave Echo Cave, Temple of Dumathoin (Area 19), exploring cautiously

knowledge.wave_echo_cave: Knows general location, has begun exploration
knowledge.forge_of_spells: Knows it exists, searching for it
knowledge.party: Knows adventurers are involved with Gundren, wants them eliminated
knowledge.phandelver_pact: Understands history, seeks to claim power for himself

current_status.location: Wave Echo Cave, Area 19 - Temple of Dumathoin
current_status.allies: 4 giant spiders, doppelganger (disguised as drow), 5 bugbears (in Area 11)
current_status.progress: Hindered by undead and monsters, proceeding carefully

combat: Casts mage armor on self if threatened
Uses invisibility to escape if possible
Uses staff powers for added protection (shield)
tactics.negotiation: Will talk, probe for information. Promises cooperation or surrender (lies). Betrays immediately when advantageous.
tactics.surrender: At 8 hp or less with no escape - values his life. Becomes model prisoner hoping for Black Spider rescue (won't come).

interrogation_reveals: Using Cragmaws and Redbrands to secure Wave Echo Cave
Black Spider contacted Iarno through Lords' Alliance intel
Promised to share Forge of Spells secrets with Iarno in exchange for help
Three bugbears sent to reinforce Redbrands
Black Spider knows location of Wave Echo Cave (duh, he's there)
Bugbears in Area 11 know Wave Echo Cave location
information_kept_secret: Drow are matriarchal. Nezznar is male wizard - unusual. Likely outcast or independent operator. No connection to drow cities mentioned.

defeat_outcomes.killed: 450 XP. Black Spider plot ends. Nundro rescued. Forge secured.
defeat_outcomes.captured_alive: 900 XP! Sildar arranges transport to Neverwinter for trial. Halia Thornton breaks him out if no guards posted, delivers to Zhentarim (DM choice for future plot).

treasure: Spider staff, potion of healing, 190 ep, 130 gp, 15 pp, 9 small gems (10 gp each), electrum ale mug (100 gp)
stat_block: See Appendix B - Nezznar the Black Spider

spells_prepared.innate: Dancing lights (at will), darkness (1/day), faerie fire (1/day)
spells_prepared.cantrips: Mage hand, ray of frost, shocking grasp

spider_staff: Black adamantine, spider-shaped top. 6 lbs. Requires attunement. Quarterstaff that deals +1d6 poison. 10 charges. Spider climb (1 charge) or web (2 charges, DC 15). Regains 1d6+4 charges at dusk. On last charge spent, d20: 1 = crumbles to dust.
dialogue_examples: "It seems that I must deal with you myself. A pity it must end this way."
"You are persistent, I'll grant you that. But persistence without wisdom is folly."
"The Forge of Spells will be mine. Its secrets are too valuable to share with... guests such as yourselves."
"Very well. You have my attention. What do you propose?" [lies about cooperation]
